typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		SOURCE_KEY as string,
		PERSON_TECHID as string,
		TITLE as string,
		FNAME as string,
		MNAME as string,
		LNAME as string,
		NAMESUFFIX as string,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		DOB as date,
		GENDER as string,
		SSN as string,
		PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG as string,
		SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG as string,
		P_A_COUNTRY as string,
		P_A_MAILLINE1 as string,
		P_A_MAILLINE2 as string,
		P_A_CITY as string,
		P_A_STATE as string,
		P_A_POSTALCODE as string,
		P_ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		P_A_COUNTY as string,
		P_A_PHONE as string,
		P_A_CELLPHONE as string,
		P_A_FAX as string,
		P_A_TOLLFREENUMBER as string,
		P_A_EMAIL as string,
		S_A_COUNTRY as string,
		S_A_MAILLINE1 as string,
		S_A_MAILLINE2 as string,
		S_A_CITY as string,
		S_A_STATE as string,
		S_A_POSTALCODE as string,
		S_ZIP_CODE5 as string,
		S_A_COUNTY as string,
		S_A_PHONE as string,
		S_A_CELLPHONE as string,
		S_A_FAX as string,
		S_A_TOLLFREENUMBER as string,
		S_A_EMAIL as string,
		CHANGE_CODE as string,
		BATCH_ID as string,
		PERSON_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_P_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERADDR_S_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_P_PH1_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_P_PH2_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_S_PH1_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_P_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM as string,
		PERCONT_S_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \nSOURCE_SYSTEM,SOURCE_KEY,PERSON_TECHID,TITLE,FNAME,MNAME,LNAME,NAMESUFFIX,TRIM(CONCAT(LNAME,\', \',FNAME,\' \',MNAME)) AS FULL_NAME,CAST(DOB as date) AS DOB,GENDER,SSN,PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG,SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG,P_A_COUNTRY,P_A_MAILLINE1,P_A_MAILLINE2,\nP_A_CITY,P_A_STATE,P_A_POSTALCODE,P_ZIP_CODE5,P_A_COUNTY,P_A_PHONE,P_A_CELLPHONE,P_A_FAX,P_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,P_A_EMAIL,S_A_COUNTRY,S_A_MAILLINE1,S_A_MAILLINE2,S_A_CITY,S_A_STATE,S_A_POSTALCODE,S_ZIP_CODE5,S_A_COUNTY,S_A_PHONE,S_A_CELLPHONE,\nS_A_FAX,S_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,S_A_EMAIL,CHANGE_CODE,BATCH_ID,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(TITLE,\'2\')+ISNULL(FNAME,\'3\')+ISNULL(MNAME,\'4\')+ISNULL(LNAME,\'6\')+ISNULL(NAMESUFFIX,\'7\')+ISNULL(DOB,\'8\')+ISNULL(GENDER,\'9\')+ISNULL(SSN,\'10\')+\nISNULL(P_A_COUNTRY,\'11\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE1,\'12\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE2,\'13\')+ISNULL(P_A_CITY,\'14\')+ISNULL(P_A_STATE,\'15\')+ISNULL(P_A_POSTALCODE,\'16\')+ISNULL(P_A_COUNTY,\'17\')+ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'18\')+\nISNULL(P_A_EMAIL,\'20\')),2) PERSON_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(SSN,\'1\')),2) PERSONIDENT_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_COUNTRY,\'11\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE1,\'12\')+ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE2,\'13\')+ISNULL(P_A_CITY,\'14\')+ISNULL(P_A_STATE,\'15\')+ISNULL(P_A_POSTALCODE,\'16\')+ISNULL(P_A_COUNTY,\'17\')),2) PERADDR_P_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(S_A_COUNTRY,\'21\')+ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE1,\'22\')+ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE2,\'23\')+ISNULL(S_A_CITY,\'24\')+ISNULL(S_A_STATE,\'25\')+ISNULL(S_A_POSTALCODE,\'26\')+ISNULL(S_A_COUNTY,\'27\')),2) PERADDR_S_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'19\')+\'PERSONAL\'+\'PHONE\'),2) PERCONT_P_PH1_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_PHONE,\'18\')+\'HOME\'+\'PHONE\'),2) PERCONT_P_PH2_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(S_A_CELLPHONE,\'29\')+\'OTHER\'+\'PHONE\'),2) PERCONT_S_PH1_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(P_A_EMAIL,\'20\')+\'PERSONAL\'+\'EMAIL\'),2) PERCONT_P_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM,\nCONVERT(NVARCHAR(32),HashBytes(\'MD5\',ISNULL(S_A_EMAIL,\'20\')+\'OTHER\'+\'EMAIL\'),2) PERCONT_S_EMAIL_CHECK_SUM\nFROM (\nSELECT SOURCE_SYSTEM,SOURCE_KEY,PERSON_TECHID,TITLE,FNAME,CASE WHEN MNAME1 IS NULL THEN MNAME2 ELSE MNAME1 END AS MNAME,LNAME,NAMESUFFIX,DOB,GENDER, SSN,\nCASE WHEN ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE1,\'\') <> \'\' OR ISNULL(P_A_MAILLINE2,\'\') <> \'\' THEN \'Y\' ELSE \'N\' END AS PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG,\nCASE WHEN ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE1,\'\') <> \'\' OR ISNULL(S_A_MAILLINE2,\'\') <> \'\' THEN \'Y\' ELSE \'N\' END AS SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG,\nP_A_COUNTRY,P_A_MAILLINE1,P_A_MAILLINE2,P_A_CITY,P_A_STATE,P_A_POSTALCODE,SUBSTRING(P_A_POSTALCODE,1,5) P_ZIP_CODE5,P_A_COUNTY,CASE WHEN ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN P_A_PHONE ELSE P_A_CELLPHONE END AS P_A_CELLPHONE,\nCASE WHEN P_A_PHONE = P_A_CELLPHONE OR ISNULL(P_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN NULL ELSE P_A_PHONE END AS P_A_PHONE,P_A_FAX,P_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,P_A_EMAIL,S_A_COUNTRY,S_A_MAILLINE1,S_A_MAILLINE2,S_A_CITY,\nS_A_STATE,S_A_POSTALCODE,SUBSTRING(S_A_POSTALCODE,1,5) S_ZIP_CODE5,S_A_COUNTY,CASE WHEN ISNULL(S_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN S_A_PHONE ELSE S_A_CELLPHONE END S_A_CELLPHONE,\nCASE WHEN S_A_PHONE = S_A_CELLPHONE OR ISNULL(S_A_CELLPHONE,\'\') = \'\' THEN NULL ELSE S_A_PHONE END AS S_A_PHONE,S_A_FAX,S_A_TOLLFREENUMBER,\nCASE WHEN S_A_EMAIL = P_A_EMAIL THEN NULL ELSE S_A_EMAIL END AS S_A_EMAIL,UPPER(CHANGE_CODE) CHANGE_CODE, batch_id FROM CMDM_STAGE.EB_MAX_DGTAL_PERSN_INFO_DELTA_STG) T\n',
	format: 'query') ~> source1
source(output(
		addressType as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		addressLine1 as string,
		addressLine2 as string,
		addressLine3 as string,
		cityName as string,
		stateCD as string,
		postalCode as string,
		poBox as string,
		mailBoxNumber as string,
		countryCD as string,
		postalCode5 as string,
		srcPersonPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		srcAddressPkey as string,
		primaryFlag as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		countyName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from [CMDM_STAGE].[PersonAddress] where sourceSystem=\'EB-MAX\'',
	format: 'query') ~> TgtPersonAddrMax
SourceDeleteInd derive(SourceCreateDateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		row_status = 'A',
		Lastupdatetime = currentTimestamp(),
		createdttime = currentTimestamp(),
		createdBy = 'MYV_STG_MAX_CLN_FULL_LOAD',
		lastUpdatedBy = 'MYV_STG_MAX_CLN_FULL_LOAD',
		addressType = 'HOME') ~> derivedColumn1
exists4 derive(SourceDeletedInd = 'N') ~> SourceDeleteInd
derivedColumn1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insert
split6@primaryAddr split(CHANGE_CODE=='NEW',
	disjoint: true) ~> split5@(if1)
split5@if1, TgtPersonAddrMax exists((SOURCE_KEY == srcPersonPkey
 && SOURCE_SYSTEM == sourceSystem && row_status == 'A' && addressType == 'HOME'),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists4
source1 split(PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG=='Y',
	SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG=='Y',
	disjoint: true) ~> split6@(primaryAddr, secondaryAddr)
split6@secondaryAddr split(CHANGE_CODE=='NEW',
	disjoint: false) ~> split7@(if)
split7@if, TgtPersonAddrMax exists((SOURCE_KEY == srcPersonPkey
 && SOURCE_SYSTEM == sourceSystem && row_status == 'A' && addressType == 'OTH'),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> exists5
exists5 derive(SourceDeletedInd = 'N') ~> derivedColumn2
derivedColumn2 derive(sourceCreatedts = currentTimestamp(),
		sourcelastupdatedts = currentTimestamp(),
		row_status = 'A',
		lastUpdatedBy = 'MYV_STG_MAX_CLN_FULL_LOAD',
		lastUpdatedateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		createdBy = 'MYV_STG_MAX_CLN_FULL_LOAD',
		createdateTime = currentTimestamp(),
		addressType = 'OTH') ~> derivedColumn3
derivedColumn3 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insert2
Insert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		addressType as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		addressLine1 as string,
		addressLine2 as string,
		addressLine3 as string,
		cityName as string,
		stateCD as string,
		postalCode as string,
		poBox as string,
		mailBoxNumber as string,
		countryCD as string,
		postalCode5 as string,
		srcPersonPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		srcAddressPkey as string,
		primaryFlag as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		countyName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		srcPersonPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		check_sum = PERADDR_P_CHECK_SUM,
		row_status,
		addressType,
		addressLine1 = P_A_MAILLINE1,
		addressLine2 = P_A_MAILLINE2,
		cityName = P_A_CITY,
		stateCD = P_A_STATE,
		countryCD = P_A_COUNTRY,
		countyName = P_A_COUNTY,
		postalCode = P_A_POSTALCODE,
		postalCode5 = P_ZIP_CODE5,
		primaryFlag = PRIMARY_ADDR_FLAG,
		SourceCreateDateTime,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime,
		lastUpdateDateTime = Lastupdatetime,
		batch_id = BATCH_ID,
		createdBy,
		createDateTime = createdttime,
		lastUpdatedBy
	)) ~> PersonInsert
Insert2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		addressType as string,
		streetAddress as string,
		addressLine1 as string,
		addressLine2 as string,
		addressLine3 as string,
		cityName as string,
		stateCD as string,
		postalCode as string,
		poBox as string,
		mailBoxNumber as string,
		countryCD as string,
		postalCode5 as string,
		srcPersonPkey as string,
		sourceSystem as string,
		srcAddressPkey as string,
		primaryFlag as string,
		row_status as string,
		batch_id as string,
		check_sum as string,
		createDateTime as timestamp,
		createdBy as string,
		lastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		lastUpdatedBy as string,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime as timestamp,
		SourceCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		countyName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		addressType,
		addressLine1 = S_A_MAILLINE1,
		addressLine2 = S_A_MAILLINE2,
		cityName = S_A_CITY,
		stateCD = S_A_STATE,
		postalCode = S_A_POSTALCODE,
		countryCD = S_A_COUNTRY,
		postalCode5 = S_ZIP_CODE5,
		srcPersonPkey = SOURCE_KEY,
		sourceSystem = SOURCE_SYSTEM,
		primaryFlag = SECONDARY_ADDR_FLAG,
		row_status,
		batch_id = BATCH_ID,
		check_sum = PERADDR_S_CHECK_SUM,
		createDateTime = createdateTime,
		createdBy,
		lastUpdateDateTime = lastUpdatedateTime,
		lastUpdatedBy,
		SourceLastUpdateDateTime = sourcelastupdatedts,
		SourceCreateDateTime = sourceCreatedts,
		countyName = S_A_COUNTY
	)) ~> personinsert2
